title: 旧约 - 创世记(Genesis) - 第 46 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 创世记(Genesis) -- 第 46 章 ( 本篇共有 50 章 )

lineList.en: And Israel took his journey with all that he had, and came to Beersheba, and offered sacrifices unto the God of his father Isaac.
lineList.cn: 以色列带着一切所有的，起身来到别是巴，就献祭给他父亲以撒的神。

lineList.en: And God spake unto Israel in the visions of the night, and said, Jacob, Jacob. And he said, Here am I.
lineList.cn: 夜间，神在异象中对以色列说，雅各。雅各。他说，我在这里。

lineList.en: And he said, I am God, the God of thy father: fear not to go down into Egypt; for I will there make of thee a great nation:
lineList.cn: 神说，我是神，就是你父亲的神。你下埃及去不要害怕，因为我必使你在那里成为大族。

lineList.en: I will go down with thee into Egypt; and I will also surely bring thee up again: and Joseph shall put his hand upon thine eyes.
lineList.cn: 我要和你同下埃及去，也必定带你上来。约瑟必给你送终（原文作将手按你的眼睛上）。

lineList.en: And Jacob rose up from Beersheba: and the sons of Israel carried Jacob their father, and their little ones, and their wives, in the wagons which Pharaoh had sent to carry him.
lineList.cn: 雅各就从别是巴起行。以色列的儿子们使他们的父亲雅各和他们的妻子，儿女都坐在法老为雅各送来的车上。

lineList.en: And they took their cattle, and their goods, which they had gotten in the land of Canaan, and came into Egypt, Jacob, and all his seed with him:
lineList.cn: 他们又带着迦南地所得的牲畜，货财来到埃及。雅各和他的一切子孙都一同来了，

lineList.en: His sons, and his sons' sons with him, his daughters, and his sons' daughters, and all his seed brought he with him into Egypt.
lineList.cn: 雅各把他的儿子，孙子，女儿，孙女，并他的子子孙孙，一同带到埃及。

lineList.en: And these are the names of the children of Israel, which came into Egypt, Jacob and his sons: Reuben, Jacob's firstborn.
lineList.cn: 来到埃及的以色列人名字记在下面。雅各和他的儿孙，雅各的长子是流便。

lineList.en: And the sons of Reuben; Hanoch, and Phallu, and Hezron, and Carmi.
lineList.cn: 流便的儿子是哈诺，法路，希斯伦，迦米。

lineList.en: And the sons of Simeon; Jemuel, and Jamin, and Ohad, and Jachin, and Zohar, and Shaul the son of a Canaanitish woman.
lineList.cn: 西缅的儿子是耶母利，雅悯，阿辖，雅斤，琐辖，还有迦南女子所生的扫罗。

lineList.en: And the sons of Levi; Gershon, Kohath, and Merari.
lineList.cn: 利未的儿子是革顺，哥辖，米拉利。

lineList.en: And the sons of Judah; Er, and Onan, and Shelah, and Pharez, and Zarah: but Er and Onan died in the land of Canaan. And the sons of Pharez were Hezron and Hamul.
lineList.cn: 犹大的儿子是珥，俄南，示拉，法勒斯，谢拉。惟有珥与俄南死在迦南地。法勒斯的儿子是希斯伦，哈母勒。

lineList.en: And the sons of Issachar; Tola, and Phuvah, and Job, and Shimron.
lineList.cn: 以萨迦的儿子是陀拉，普瓦，约伯，伸仑。

lineList.en: And the sons of Zebulun; Sered, and Elon, and Jahleel.
lineList.cn: 西布伦的儿子是西烈，以伦，雅利。

lineList.en: These be the sons of Leah, which she bare unto Jacob in Padanaram, with his daughter Dinah: all the souls of his sons and his daughters were thirty and three.
lineList.cn: 这是利亚在巴旦亚兰给雅各所生的儿子，还在女儿底拿。儿孙共三十三人。

lineList.en: And the sons of Gad; Ziphion, and Haggi, Shuni, and Ezbon, Eri, and Arodi, and Areli.
lineList.cn: 迦得的儿子是洗非芸，哈基，书尼，以斯本，以利，亚罗底，亚列利。

lineList.en: And the sons of Asher; Jimnah, and Ishuah, and Isui, and Beriah, and Serah their sister: and the sons of Beriah; Heber, and Malchiel.
lineList.cn: 亚设的儿子是音拿，亦施瓦，亦施韦，比利亚，还有他们的妹子西拉。比利亚的儿子是希别，玛结。

lineList.en: These are the sons of Zilpah, whom Laban gave to Leah his daughter, and these she bare unto Jacob, even sixteen souls.
lineList.cn: 这是拉班给他女儿利亚的婢女悉帕从雅各所生的儿孙，共有十六人。

lineList.en: The sons of Rachel Jacob's wife; Joseph, and Benjamin.
lineList.cn: 雅各之妻拉结的儿子是约瑟和便雅悯。

lineList.en: And unto Joseph in the land of Egypt were born Manasseh and Ephraim, which Asenath the daughter of Potipherah priest of On bare unto him.
lineList.cn: 约瑟在埃及地生了玛拿西和以法莲，就是安城的祭司波提非拉的女儿亚西纳给约瑟生的。

lineList.en: And the sons of Benjamin were Belah, and Becher, and Ashbel, Gera, and Naaman, Ehi, and Rosh, Muppim, and Huppim, and Ard.
lineList.cn: 便雅悯的儿子是比拉，比结，亚实别，基拉，乃幔，以希，罗实，母平，户平，亚勒。

lineList.en: These are the sons of Rachel, which were born to Jacob: all the souls were fourteen.
lineList.cn: 这是拉结给雅各所生的儿孙，共有十四人。

lineList.en: And the sons of Dan; Hushim.
lineList.cn: 但的儿子是户伸。

lineList.en: And the sons of Naphtali; Jahzeel, and Guni, and Jezer, and Shillem.
lineList.cn: 拿弗他利的儿子是雅薛，沽尼，耶色，示冷。

lineList.en: These are the sons of Bilhah, which Laban gave unto Rachel his daughter, and she bare these unto Jacob: all the souls were seven.
lineList.cn: 这是拉班给他女儿拉结的婢女辟拉从雅各所生的儿孙，共有七人。

lineList.en: All the souls that came with Jacob into Egypt, which came out of his loins, besides Jacob's sons' wives, all the souls were threescore and six;
lineList.cn: 那与雅各同到埃及的，除了他儿妇之外，凡从他所生的，共有六十六人。

lineList.en: And the sons of Joseph, which were born him in Egypt, were two souls: all the souls of the house of Jacob, which came into Egypt, were threescore and ten.
lineList.cn: 还有约瑟在埃及所生的两个儿子。雅各家来到埃及的共有七十人。

lineList.en: And he sent Judah before him unto Joseph, to direct his face unto Goshen; and they came into the land of Goshen.
lineList.cn: 雅各打发犹大先去见约瑟，请派人引路往歌珊去。于是他们来到歌珊地。

lineList.en: And Joseph made ready his chariot, and went up to meet Israel his father, to Goshen, and presented himself unto him; and he fell on his neck, and wept on his neck a good while.
lineList.cn: 约瑟套车往歌珊去，迎接他父亲以色列，及至见了面，就伏在父亲的颈项，哭了许久。

lineList.en: And Israel said unto Joseph, Now let me die, since I have seen thy face, because thou art yet alive.
lineList.cn: 以色列对约瑟说，我既得见你的面，知道你还在，就是死我也甘心。

lineList.en: And Joseph said unto his brethren, and unto his father's house, I will go up, and shew Pharaoh, and say unto him, My brethren, and my father's house, which were in the land of Canaan, are come unto me;
lineList.cn: 约瑟对他的弟兄和他父的全家说，我要上去告诉法老，对他说，我的弟兄和我父的全家从前在迦南地，现今都到我这里来了。

lineList.en: And the men are shepherds, for their trade hath been to feed cattle; and they have brought their flocks, and their herds, and all that they have.
lineList.cn: 他们本是牧羊的人，以养牲畜为业。他们把羊群牛群和一切所有的都带来了。

lineList.en: And it shall come to pass, when Pharaoh shall call you, and shall say, What is your occupation?
lineList.cn: 等法老召你们的时候，问你们说，你们以何事为业。

lineList.en: That ye shall say, Thy servants' trade hath been about cattle from our youth even until now, both we, and also our fathers: that ye may dwell in the land of Goshen; for every shepherd is an abomination unto the Egyptians.
lineList.cn: 你们要说，你的仆人，从幼年直到如今，都以养牲畜为业，连我们的祖宗也都以此为业。这样，你们可以住在歌珊地，因为凡牧羊的都被埃及人所厌恶。
